Can Indian Economy expect revival despite rising inflation? What do you think are the major steps that can be taken in present circumstances to push growth in the country?

          Inflation is the general rise in prices in an economy. It exsists in diffenent forms like active inflation,growing inflation , etc.Inflation rate is generally effected by many factors like exports of a country,imports of a country, interest rates, prices of essencial commodies , rupee value ,demand and supply  etc .In India a developing country inflation is rising in the economy due to which basic and essencials of living like food ,clothing,shelter is becoming unaffordable for people under poverty line decreasing growth and creating disparities of income. Inflation is calculated by considering the day to day prices of commodies.Indian economy can expect revival despite of rising inflation if inflation is controlled in an effective manner by the government and RBI.          

             The Reserve Bank of India(RBI) can play an important role and can effect inflation rates in Indian economy because the interest rates are decided by RBI being National bank of the country.

              To increase growth in an undeveloped country like India the government should provide more qualitied education and employment facilities so that the national income and employment rate increases . This in turn is followed by increses the buying capacity and standerd of living of the people . India to push growth needs to spend wiselly and stop corruption which is present in almost all sectors of India. If the funds of government are utilies correctly in developing government schools, colleges ,building small houses for the poor etc., the country can grow in an incresing rate.Government should also provide basic commodies at a lesser price so that it can be affordable to all sections of population. By following all this steps India can grow to become a developed country.
